statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_reporting;
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_reporting;
SELECT report_type, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_reporting WHERE data_extracted = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_reporting ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_type, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_reporting WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_reporting ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_type;
SELECT report_id, report_type, report_date FROM regulatory_compliance_reporting WHERE compliance_status='Completed';
SELECT report_date, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_reporting WHERE data_extracted=TRUE ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_type, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_reporting WHERE report_type LIKE '%Risk%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_reporting WHERE compliance_status='Pending' ORDER BY report_id;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type, compliance_score FROM compliance_report WHERE compliance_score > 80;
SELECT report_type, report_date, compliance_score, report_id FROM compliance_report WHERE report_type = 'Monthly';
SELECT report_date, report_type, compliance_score FROM compliance_report WHERE report_type LIKE '%Quarterly%';
SELECT report_id, compliance_score, report_type, report_date FROM compliance_report ORDER BY compliance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_extraction WHERE extraction_status = 'completed';
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type, compliance_score FROM compliance_report WHERE compliance_score > 80 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT extraction_id, extraction_date, extraction_type, database_name, table_name, extraction_status FROM data_extraction WHERE extraction_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY extraction_date ASC
SELECT report_type, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM compliance_report GROUP BY report_type HAVING num_reports > 2 ORDER BY num_reports DESC
SELECT MAX(compliance_score) AS max_score FROM compliance_report
SELECT AVG(compliance_score) AS avg_score, MIN(compliance_score) AS min_score FROM compliance_report
SELECT id, name FROM table1;
SELECT address, name FROM table1 ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM table2 WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT industry, company_name FROM table2 WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT employee_id, department, manager FROM table3 ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM table1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, industry, revenue FROM table2 WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT id, employee_id, department, hire_date FROM table3 WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM table1 JOIN table2 ON table1.id = table2.id;
SELECT id, name, address, date_created FROM table1 ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_reports;
SELECT report_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT check_name, check_description FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY check_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sql_database_connections WHERE database_host = 'localhost';
SELECT connection_name, database_name, username FROM sql_database_connections WHERE id <= 5;
SELECT id, report_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM regulatory_compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_result = FALSE LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, check_name, check_description FROM compliance_checks WHERE LENGTH(check_description) > 100;

SELECT report_name, report_date, completion_status FROM regulatory_compliance_reports INNER JOIN compliance_reports_history ON regulatory_compliance_reports.id = compliance_reports_history.report_id ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT id, name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.name;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM reports WHERE status='pending';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT e.name, d.name AS department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.name;
SELECT rd.report_date, cd.compliance_type, cd.compliance_status FROM reports rd JOIN compliance_data cd ON rd.report_id = cd.report_id WHERE rd.status = 'Approved';
